title: 2014 Christmas Skins: Where's Snowman Zac
body: Pretty much as title says , there's hardly any Zac skins and Christmas provides Riot the opportunity to make a Zac skin. b0sses ples make.

replies.body:
His new buffs on patch 4.21 made him a lot better, if they gave him back his release Ulti damage he'd be meta again. Oh and when his passive goes off with this skin as they rejoin music plays  *~Do you wanna build a snowman~* . ITS PERFECT RITO PLES!!!

{{item:3270}} {{item:3270}} {{item:3270}}
Never thought of this. I've always considered cotton candy zac or bubble zac. I LOVE THIS IDEA! AND THE MUSIC SHOULD ALSO BE PLAYED WHEN HIS PASSIVE POPS
i actually love that idea, and zac is severely under-played, at least in my elo
Zac got some extra ap on his e now, and they gave his ult some more cc, he is some-what better but I think they need to buff his ultimate dmg a bit :l
